name: rosterpilot
description: Advisory companion for Yahoo Fantasy Football. Read-only Yahoo scopes. Official NFL game data from PyESPN.

scripts.dev: echo 'Starting frontend and backend... (run in separate terminals)'
scripts.dev:frontend: cd frontend && npm install && npm run dev
scripts.dev:backend: cd backend && poetry install && poetry run uvicorn app.main:app --reload
scripts.build:frontend: cd frontend && npm install && npm run build
scripts.lint: npm run lint:frontend && npm run lint:backend
scripts.lint:backend: cd backend && poetry run ruff check . && poetry run mypy .
scripts.test: npm run test:frontend && npm run test:backend
scripts.deploy:backend: gcloud builds submit backend --tag gcr.io/$GOOGLE_CLOUD_PROJECT/rosterpilot-api:$(git rev-parse --short HEAD) && gcloud run deploy rosterpilot-api --image gcr.io/$GOOGLE_CLOUD_PROJECT/rosterpilot-api:$(git rev-parse --short HEAD) --platform managed --region us-central1 --allow-unauthenticated --port 8080 --concurrency 80 --cpu 1 --memory 512Mi --timeout 3600 --min-instances 0 --max-instances 2 --set-secrets=DATABASE_URL=RP_DATABASE_URL:latest,REDIS_URL=RP_REDIS_URL:latest,YAHOO_CLIENT_ID=RP_YH_ID:latest,YAHOO_CLIENT_SECRET=RP_YH_SECRET:latest,YAHOO_REDIRECT_URI=RP_YH_REDIRECT:latest
scripts.deploy:frontend: echo 'Frontend is deployed via Cloudflare Pages, usually automatically from a git push. See DEPLOYMENT.md for details.'
scripts.fix:backend:lockfile: cd backend && rm -f poetry.lock && poetry lock
